description: Interesting hike around Mont Tremblant park. It can be done in 3 or 4 days (stayed at Refuges).
directions: 145 km from Montreal. You can arrive there from Mont-Tremblant. Road to sector La Diable. Parking close to Le Ravage. There is also a visitors centre (3824 Chemin du Lac Supérieur).
title: Parc national du Mont-Tremblant
